last_episode_to_air.name: Not Now
last_episode_to_air.overview: After a change of heart Ed's starting to see things clearly for the first time in his life and he makes a big decision based on his new priorities.

name: The Now
overview: For Ed Poole, clarity comes when a secret from his past has seemingly destroyed his future. He soon realizes the only thing that will make his life worth living is to forget the past, screw the future and just live in The Now.

episodes.name: Call Fromâ€¦Mother
episodes.overview: Ed's got plans for his night at home, but an unexpected call from his mother derails everything, forcing him to rethink first his evening and then his entire life.

episodes.name: Don't Shush Your Mother
episodes.overview: After a tragic event in Ed's life, he starts trying to work through his feelings in therapy, hoping to deal with the nightmare of his overbearing mother.

episodes.name: Does the Suspense Not Ever Get to You?
episodes.overview: Ed has a secret and he's been doing his best to keep it from his family.

episodes.name: See You at Ten, Ed-O
episodes.overview: Unfinished business from his brother's past shows up in Ed's present and he struggles with the best way to resolve old issues.

episodes.name: Take a Piece of Him
episodes.overview: When Ed decides to live in the moment and blow off some pretty important plans, he's unprepared to deal with the consequences.

episodes.name: No Past, No Future, Just the Current Moment
episodes.overview: Ed has a new outlook after listening to some life changing advice, which leaves his friends concerned about his mental health.

episodes.name: Why Does This Ice Stink?
episodes.overview: Ed has a new philosophy on life.

episodes.name: Good News, You're Not Dead
episodes.overview: Ed's new way of thinking has the potential to damage his mother's business deal, putting the family's financial stability in jeopardy.

episodes.name: A Little Crazy... But Good Crazy
episodes.overview: Ed becomes obsessed with showing the people closest to him that he's changed for the better and plans to make a grand gesture to prove his point.

episodes.name: We Gotta Drink Bud
episodes.overview: Strapped for cash, Ed trusts his friends to help him make some big money, fast.

episodes.name: Sharing Is Caring
episodes.overview: Hal and Ed struggle to pay their debts, but an interesting set of circumstances changes their situation; meanwhile Coop is dealing with an intriguing proposition of his own.

episodes.name: It Was Just a Nick
episodes.overview: Ed makes a generous offer to save the people he cares about and tries to turn over a new leaf with his family's company.

episodes.name: Bottomings
episodes.overview: When Ed's life is thrown completely out of control, an unexpected visit from an acquaintance helps him see things more clearly.

episodes.name: Not Now
episodes.overview: After a change of heart Ed's starting to see things clearly for the first time in his life and he makes a big decision based on his new priorities.
